articles.description: Sydney has held on to its beloved New Year's Test after a desperate bid by the NSW government and the state's cricket officials to keep the iconic fixture at the SCG.

articles.author: PerthNow
articles.title: Australia fined and docked Test Championship points for slow over-rate in second Test - PerthNow
articles.description: Australia have been fined 40 per cent of their match fee and penalised four ICC World Test Championship points for a slow over-rate during their Boxing Day Test loss to India at the MCG.
articles.content:
